General.Name: Weihai Guangtai Airport Equipment Co Ltd
General.Description: Weihai Guangtai Airport Equipment Co.,Ltd engages in manufacture and sale of ground support equipment and fire-fighting equipment in China and internationally. The company offers airport equipment, such as container cargo loaders, aircraft tractors, passenger shuttle buses, aircraft tank type refueling trucks, aircraft deicing trucks, airport snow removal trucks, 400Hz aircraft power supplies, passenger boarding bridges, etc.; and fire trucks and emergency rescue vehicles. It also provides fire alarm, intelligent emergency lighting and evacuation instruction, monitoring and detection, and automatic tracking and positioning jet fire extinguishing systems; mobile medical emergency rescue equipment; and military airport equipment and special equipment, as well as after-sale services. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Weihai, China.
